body_html:
1. Would you please update your conda using conda update conda?
  2. No, Community version is enough. I guess your version of MSVC BuildTools is too high or the PATH of VS150COMNTOOLS may be incorrect.
  3. Make sure you install CUDA after installing the corresponding version of MSVC. And it will be installed. Actually it is located in the setup executable. You can extract it and find that.
body_text:
Would you please update your conda using conda update conda?
No, Community version is enough. I guess your version of MSVC BuildTools is too high or the PATH of VS150COMNTOOLS may be incorrect.
Make sure you install CUDA after installing the corresponding version of MSVC. And it will be installed. Actually it is located in the setup executable. You can extract it and find that.
body:
1. Would you please update your conda using `conda update conda`?
2. No, Community version is enough. I guess your version of MSVC BuildTools is too high or the PATH of VS150COMNTOOLS may be incorrect.
3. Make sure you install CUDA after installing the corresponding version of MSVC. And it will be installed. Actually it is located in the setup executable. You can extract it and find that.
